I'm trying to get an interdimensional story approved, saying that ALL 
the Transformer series happened, just in seperated demisions. I am 
also saying that the Matrix MIGHT be with the NEW Omega Prime which 
was created when the original Omega Prime was created in RID (thanks 
for the abbriviation all the typing was hurting my fingers). It was 
some kind of power surge, but if you like we could just say the Matrix 
stayed in the other demision. I just think Omega Primes cool.  The 
only problem with that series is they call out there attacks. What do 
they think transformers is Pokemon?  I won't be doing that if I can 
get this approved. And I might want to point out that all the 
Tranformer Series I've seen have been BW, BM, RID, and 1 episode of Go 
Bots.  I don't know any others.  ALSO BM WAS MY FAVORITE SO STOP BAD 
MOUTHING IT!  BW WAS GOOD, BUT HOW IN THE HECK IS LOOKING LIKE ANIMALS 
GOING TO HELP YOU IF YOU'RE STILL TOTALLY MACHINE.  FURTHERMORE WHY 
DID THEY EAT FOOD IF THEY WERE PURLY MACHINE.  AND I LIKED ALL THE 
INTENSE SCENES IN BM WHERE THERE WAS TO MUCH COMEDY IN BW!  LIKE I 
SAID BW WAS STILL GREAT, BUT IT CAN'T MATCH BM!  UNDERSTAND NOW!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy... you apparently are highly confused and be;lieve bw, 
and RID 
> are entirely different continuities. BW followed the G1 comic and 
cartoon 
> continuity and in that, the Matrix was used up already. Not the 
Matrix 
> dimension itself, but the device that used its powers. Which was the 
Autobot 
> Matrix of leader ship. And as for everyone having portable DNA 
scanners in 
> BM... BM was a piece of crap IMO as well as the opinion of tohers, 
it 
> butchered the charachters old personalities as well as the old 
continuity. 
> Now we have Robots in Disguise, RID is not in the same continuity as 
any of 
> those shows. Its an en tirely independant show what was dubbed for 
US 
> Release. The toys and everything were changed and modified, it has 
no hold on 
> the continuity. Besides the matrix is already present in the RPG 
which I 
> think either prowl or Iron Raptor has... although I think it may 
only be a 
> small matrix device like that used by Big Convoy and Lio Convoy but 
im not 
> fully sure. However the original matrix of leadership is gone and 
destroyed...
